column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////To that end
column2: I believe JINYA offers a premium product at a competitive price. You may disagree
column3: but as a small-business owner and a self-proclaimed ramen connoisseur
column4: I can tell you a great amount of work goes into (and has gone into) every bowl of JINYA ramen. And for that I will forever stand by our product and services. Thank you again for your feedback and I hope you visit us again.
